GET /api.description: serves up a JSON representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of the selected article by given article_id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an array of the selected article by given article_id

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles for all topics

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for given article_id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates votes for article of given article_id, request body accepts inc_votes:newVotes(number), responds with updated article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates votes for comment of given comment_id, request body accepts inc_votes:newVotes(number), responds with updated comment

comment.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comment.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/.description: creates new article, request body accepts title, topic, author and body; an article_img_url is optional. Responds with posted article

exampleBody.title: Test article is my passion
exampleBody.author: butter_bridge
exampleBody.body: This is a test article. My mere existence is reduced to a test

article.title: Test article is my passion
article.author: butter_bridge
article.body: This is a test article. My mere existence is reduced to a test

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: creates new comment on article for given article_id, request body accepts username and body, responds with posted comment

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes comment for given comment_id, returning 204 no content
